short_instructions.https://studio.code.org/s/aquatic/stage/: Collect a boat from the chest.
Head to the end of the dock.
Head across the open seas to the cod.
Use a loop to get to the dolphin.
Explore the shipwreck to reach the chest.
Navigate through the ice to reach the salmon.
Search these underwater ruins for a chest.
Use the coral as waypoints to reach the treasure.
Get to the entrance of this Ocean Monument.
Build a conduit with Prismarine inside the Ocean Monument.
Design your own underwater environment, itâ€™s up to you!

long_instructions.https://studio.code.org/s/aquatic/stage/: You need supplies for the voyage ahead. Collect a **boat** [][0] from the **chest** [][1].
Boats are much easier than swimming in open water! Head to the end of the dock to hop aboard.
Grab the oars and pilot your boat across the open seas to catch the **cod** [][0].
Let's feed the cod to the **dolphin** [][0]. Use a repeat until block to get across the ocean faster.
There's a **nautilus shell** [][0] hidden somewhere! Explore the shipwreck to reach the **chest** [][1].
Looks freezing out there! Catch a **salmon** [][0] on your way to the underwater ruins.
You found the underwater ruins. Search the sandstone for a **chest** [][0] containing **prismarine** [][1] treasure.
First icebergs, now lava? Get through this volcanic island and find the **tropical fish** [][0] in the coral reef.
You made it to the reef, now search for the **Heart of the Sea** [][0] ! Use the blue and red coral to reach the treasure **chest** [][1].
There is a **squid** [][0] hiding somewhere in this Ocean Monument, can you find it?
Build a wall of **prismarine** [][0] around the black concrete. This will activate the **conduit** [][1] and complete your challenge!
Congratulations! The open aquatic world awaits you. Build a coral reef! A volcano! A shipwreck! It's up to you.

https://studio.code.org/s/aquatic/stage/.aquatic7: You can use the if path block to help you make the right turns.

https://studio.code.org/s/aquatic/stage/.voyage_aquatic_9a: See the red and blue coral blocks? Use them as guideposts to turn right and left through the reef.

https://studio.code.org/s/aquatic/stage/.voyage_aquatic_10a: See the **Sea Lanterns** [][0]? How can you use a conditional with them to get through the Ocean Monument?
